website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking an extra-wide broom from a recognized company will find their match in this generously sized product.
pros: Extra-large broom head is 14 inches wide
Flare-tip technology built to trap unwanted dust and hair
Bristles are made with 83% recycled plastic for an eco-friendly product
cons: Head can begin to wobble after heavy use

customer_reviews.title: I'm a CUSTOMER not a garbage man, don't sell me your trash.
customer_reviews.text: This freaking thing. The screw head on the bottom of the pole is the softest plastic ever. The threading stripped the first time i put it in, because its NOT THE SAME THREAD SIZE AS THE BROOM. WTF??? Why is everything such crap these days?? BUY A METAL ONE
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It came with broken bristles and fuzzy ends that would ...
customer_reviews.text: It came with broken bristles and fuzzy ends that would break apart. I still used it for few weeks then few more bristles fell out of the hole. I mean there are still other bristles left but still not what I want to see in a broom when my ikea's 1.99 broom was still going strong for years. I'd still be using that one if it wasn't for the trapped spider in the bristles that I did not want to mess with.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholics

customer_reviews.title: Broom repeatedly falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Before it repeatedly separated from the handle of the broom swept OK but only for a few minutes at a time before it would fall apart. Very disappointing. I called the company hoping there was some “secret information” or some suggestions but it does look straightforward one end screws in to the broom and and tighten. Although I tightened it as tight as I could within a very short time suddenly you’re holding the handle and the broom is falling on the floor. Total waste!
customer_reviews.author: ellen g

customer_reviews.title: The best I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I have used tons of brooms in my 57 years of life. This one is the very best I've ever owned. When I researched brooms on Amazon, a few days ago, I didn't think much about it. I only wanted one which head was large enough. But, oh, my! It slides so smoothly on the floor and pick up everything easily. I'll never buy another brand. This is not a sponsored review.
customer_reviews.author: Bhakti-lata Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Great broom! Sturdy and strong.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I was going to like this broom but I have to say, it is the best broom I have owned so far to use inside my house. The line of bristles is narrower than I thought they would be, which actually makes the broom work better than my old one with a wider row of bristles. The handle and base are super sturdy. It gets into corners really well. It's a great broom!
customer_reviews.author: Twinderella

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money. Totally in efficient
customer_reviews.text: The broom headom that screws onto the handle keeps coming unscrewed. And the two handle pieces that go together keep coming apart. Waste of money. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: sas

customer_reviews.title: I like the width of this broom
customer_reviews.text: I like the width of this broom, but it seems to create a bit of a dust cloud when sweeping and my other brooms don't as much. It also is so wide that it really only fits with the dust pan that matches it, which is so shallow it barely holds anything and stuff flies out of it when walking to the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lilly

customer_reviews.title: ... received this cedar broom yesterday & it is in bad shape!
customer_reviews.text: I received this cedar broom yesterday & it is in bad shape!! The bristles are all over the place except straight. I’m very disappointed....because I could not return OR exchange it!!! I WILL NOT BE PURCHASING ANY MORE ITEMS FROM THIS MANUFACTURER. I’m giving it ONE STAR because they have a NO return policy & NO guarantee. I DID NOT KNOW THIS UNTIL I TRIED TO RETURN IT!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Bledsoe

customer_reviews.title: adjustable pole (2 piece) comes apart.
customer_reviews.text: The pole is adjustable and it comes apart. I have been using O'cedar brooms for over 5 years personally and for my business, this adjustable pole was not described when I ordered the 2 brooms and is a terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Very nice broom, questionable handle
customer_reviews.text: Sweeps really well and doesn't leave dust behind like my old broom. The handle comes in three parts which screw together to make it easier to ship. I am concerned about the durability of this design, plus the handle is a bit short for my taste (I am 5'8") otherwise I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan Ryerson

customer_reviews.title: flawed handle
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's just a problem inherent in these kinds of items that they make them so that it's easiest to ship them, but that makes the handle weak. Mine tends to come apart at the joint. So far, the screw-on broom head stays put pretty well, but I'm afraid that over time it will loosen. I just wish I could get a solid product. The bristles are good, so it does pick up most particles on my tile floor.
customer_reviews.author: N. Corwyn

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only three stars due to no handle with it like in your photos. No statements anywhere broom head only purchase handle separate. For price should be included.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda n James

customer_reviews.title: Handel and head have fallen off
customer_reviews.text: just 3 days,the handle comes in 3 pc., and head scews on, so if you turn it,they come apart easily.Says cleans in one sweep, not many, but you still have to sweep several times over the same place.Pretty good broom over all,so far,with a few problems.Should be permanently together when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Broke way too easily
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a couple days. How? I simply tapped it moderately hard against my foot to get the lint off. The cheap metal in the handle buckled and now I have a curved broom.
customer_reviews.author: Garfieldsam

customer_reviews.title: Bent bristles and used
customer_reviews.text: Came with bent bristles and used. Was really hoping the users before had just gotten an unlucky batch, but apparently this is a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: GOOD Tool!
customer_reviews.text: Nice! I use this broom to clean floors where the wall-to-wall carpet meets up with the wall. (You know there is lint or dust there that needs to be loosened.) THEN I vacuum the floors/rugs. It is a great aid for cleaning. Like how the bristles come to a point at one end. You can "aim and attack", to get to those hard to reach areas.
customer_reviews.author: SCWoman

customer_reviews.title: poor design, handle has cheap plastic end that screws ...
customer_reviews.text: poor design , handle has cheap plastic end that screws into broom. Broke off in the first week!! now it is trash. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ernie geluz

customer_reviews.title: Handle won't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: The threading connecting the broom head to the handle would not tightne after less than a month, broom would not stay together after.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Handle keeps coming loose.
customer_reviews.text: I love the broom and the way it is angled but the handle keeps coming loose and you have to screw it back on. Doesn't stay tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK, not great
customer_reviews.text: I was slightly disappointed, considering the higher priced. It does pick up dust but the fibers were bent when I received it in the mail. I don't know if this is because of the product or the shipping itself. I'll keep it but won't buy another one like it. Spent alot of time looking!
customer_reviews.author: Sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Brush won’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: The brush won’t stay on. I’ve glued it and it comes off all the time. I love the way it works when the brush stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: This broom is sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: This broom is sturdy and well-made, and perfectly does what it was designed to do. I love how well it gets into corners under the cabinets and makes short work of the dust and pet hair that loves to gather there.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: the size of the angle brush
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize the width of the angle brush was too big for my small kitchen!!
customer_reviews.author: Walton

customer_reviews.title: Great broom at a great price tis is my third one over the years
customer_reviews.text: I'm a janitor it gets in corners with no problem lightweight easy to maneuver ill always use this style of broom don't waste money on cheaper model
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Very good angled broom
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Equals or passes my favorite broom of 30 years. Lightweight. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Good head
customer_reviews.text: The head is great. I find the handle a few inches too short. I'm 6' tall. I think I can just buy a longer handle. Also the swivel at the top is probably nice for hanging it but for me it's annoying to try to use to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: Brin

customer_reviews.title: Nice angle broom
customer_reviews.text: Like this broom because of it's angle head, good bristles and sturdy handle.
customer_reviews.author: rsper

customer_reviews.title: A FINE SWEEPING BROOM
customer_reviews.text: Bought this broom with the matching dustpan. We love it. I gets lots of dirt up and even grabs the dust bunnies. Very very pleased and so is my wife. I expected it to be good since it was an O-Cedar and I was right having the highexpectations.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn  H

customer_reviews.title: Sweeps stuff
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job well. Stands up on its own when the planets align.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Really nice broom
customer_reviews.text: Very good at sweeping up messes, wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Edie Manring

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Has the potential to be awesome, but keeps falling apart while in use. Considering super gluing the darn thing together.
customer_reviews.author: IrateGerbil

customer_reviews.title: No Dust Pan
customer_reviews.text: The broom itself is good. The only problem is it does NOT come with a dust pan. Most brooms like this have a dust pan attached. I made the mistake of assuming this one would as well. Don't be fooled, you will need to buy a dust pan separately.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Potter

customer_reviews.title: Good lightweight design that does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Love the lightweight handle on this broom and the straight and corner angle which is a great helper. Have one of these in my front porch, another in my garden lanai and this last one is now in my garage. Excellent broom and O Cedar quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Gilgomez

customer_reviews.title: Great value for price.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong with any O Cedar product for quality and product.
customer_reviews.author: JackMB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome broom!!! Better than the regular one!
customer_reviews.text: We got this broom after our regular o-cedar broom broke and even though I loved that one this one is even better! The bristles are more stiff which makes is so it even sweeps up things that are a little bit stuck to the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof4

customer_reviews.title: Pole broke from base
customer_reviews.text: I was actually very happy with it but then all of a sudden the pole completely broke off from the sweeper piece. I’m disappointed that it would so easily break.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best brooms. I only buy this brand my last one lasted more than 10 years ..
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rico

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived bent about half way up the handle. Package appeared fine. It works well enough, but feels flimsy/floppy due to the bend. Not worth he effort of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Did not last but 4 months!  Durability-absolutely trash!
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the fact it would loosen up at the base of the broom and broom stick. I would have to tighten 2-3 per use. Definitely not worth what I paid for it! I might as well gone to Walmart or Dollar Tree for that matter. Very disappointed with the quality of this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Broom!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Broom. Stiff enough to grab the steel chips from the manufacturing side of the shop and still grab the food crumbs and dust from the employees lunchroom.
customer_reviews.author: N Marsack

customer_reviews.title: I love O-Cedar cleaning products
customer_reviews.text: I do prefer the angle brooms. I was too lazy to go to the store, so I ordered this one. Overpriced. Not as firm as I prefer. I love O-Cedar cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: shonda b

customer_reviews.title: Hard Bristles
customer_reviews.text: Bristles are a little too hard for my liking, but I do like the angle to get into corners better and under the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: MommaBear3Cubs

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived today, just as promised. Imagine that on a Sunday! I'm very happy with it. It's good and sturdy and looks like it will hold up just fine. I swept the garage and love the way it handles. And on a less important note ... I LOVE the red color!!!! Thank you O-Cedar!!!
customer_reviews.author: Norma D. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Another broom
customer_reviews.text: Not all that happy with this broom. I thought I was buying a nice broom but not so much.
customer_reviews.author: "G Man"

customer_reviews.title: Angle broom captures NM sea sand, garden soil, fine adobe dust and dust bunnies!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set with matching anti-static option dustpan.The broom captures NM sea sand, garden soil, fine adobe dust and dust bunnies! It is med-soft and works well in corners.
customer_reviews.author: Corinthians

customer_reviews.title: I guess I developed an emotional attachment to a broom.
customer_reviews.text: After years of trouble free service I bought a second one. Makes other brooms look like an autistic four year old teaching an economics seminar. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: George Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Three peice twist together pole
customer_reviews.text: The pole I received was in three peices and twist together for 20$. You can buy this broom pole in one solid piece for 12$ at stores like family dollar and walmart
customer_reviews.author: Elaine carson

customer_reviews.title: FALLS APART
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it unless you plan on gluing the handles together!!!
customer_reviews.author: BILL

customer_reviews.title: Great broom for tile and other floors
customer_reviews.text: This broom does a great job picking up all the lint, hair, and dust on the floor without leaving any trail behind on the floor. Easy to maneuver into nooks and crannies to get everything clean and tidy. Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. The only thing is a little but on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Best broom
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this broom for 2 years and I love it! It’s help up really well and is a quality broom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item looks like it has been used
customer_reviews.text: This item looks like it has been used. The bristles on the broom look used, the handle has scrapes on it, the label was torn off and there is a no return policy. I can not return or tell anyone if the condition of this broom.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J Moreland

customer_reviews.title: Handle & broom head do not fit together, therefore it does not work
customer_reviews.text: Handle & broom head do not fit together. The head does not fit the handle so it falls off & does not work. Paid $ for a broom that is useless. This should be replaced by Amazon with a broom that works.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Palella

customer_reviews.title: Clean sweep!
customer_reviews.text: Mostly kitchen and back porch use! Strong and well built. Worth the extra $$!
customer_reviews.author: #1Nova

customer_reviews.title: Good Broom
customer_reviews.text: Love this broom and it's a good price! I will be buying this one again!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: The only thing to do a better clean-up job is a cumbersome vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box and used it. The stiff bristles work as well as a new straw broom, except it doesn't leave behind any straws!
customer_reviews.author: Mel Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: A good quality broom!
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand why so many reviewers give this handy well-made broom less than five stars-- It's a kitchen broom, for heaven's sake, not a luxury car! The tips are feathered, so it sweeps up even small dust particles, reaches into corners, and between cupboards and appliances, and seems well- constructed for daily use. I have used it several times a week for about a month, and have seen no handle issues at all. Maybe the manufacturer has fixed that problem??
customer_reviews.author: alaskafan

customer_reviews.title: Plastic tube that sits between the two metal parts at ...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic tube that sits between the two metal parts at the joint broke after just a couple of days. Trying to fix it with plastic epoxy now, but be wary.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: It's fine. It's a broom
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. It's a broom. I wish the bristle ends were just a bit softer. And, this broom doesn't include a dustpan. The description is accurate, but I thought dustpans were pretty standard.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph P

customer_reviews.title: 2 days after getting this broom, the handle detached ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 days after getting this broom, the handle detached from the head and will not go back on. This is the second one I've owned and the first one did the exact same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sweep
customer_reviews.text: Great sweeper no issues wish it came with dust pan
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doing a good job collecting construction dust and small bits of plaster and wood.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: It’s almost disgusting how much dirt and hair it picks up off ...
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked at how well this works. It’s almost disgusting how much dirt and hair it picks up off my wood floors
customer_reviews.author: Elsha

customer_reviews.title: ... to a new house and anytime we moved I like to replace my brown
customer_reviews.text: We just moved to a new house and anytime we moved I like to replace my brown. Superstitions and what not. I have had about 5 brooms or so in my life time and this has been my favorite one so far.
customer_reviews.author: Two boys and a hubby

customer_reviews.title: Price should’ve been cut in half
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed of the price way too much money I expected a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy I bought two
customer_reviews.text: Works very well at getting into corners, and picking up big and small pieces of dirt. Happy I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: allegro

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly better
customer_reviews.text: It's a broom. Duh. But, it's a little better. The heft and balance make sweeping ever so slightly easier. The improvement is noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ramm

customer_reviews.title: Does a very good job!
customer_reviews.text: Very good broom. Sturdy and gets up the dirt easily. Only disappointment was that some of the outer bristles were bent in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: PA Resident

customer_reviews.title: Shipping and packaging problem.
customer_reviews.text: Received broom and it was bent almost in half, unusable.
customer_reviews.author: rml

customer_reviews.title: Still Disappointed with the Plastic Bristles.....
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new broom. I am tired of the plastic ones. I am going back to the tried and true Corn Brooms! I didn't know they still made them but they do!
customer_reviews.author: Vineyard Girl

customer_reviews.title: You will like this
customer_reviews.text: I think that this is the best broom which I have used. I recommend this very much.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Picks up all of the dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Has a good angle and picks up all the dog hair that my german shepherd leaves around.
customer_reviews.author: chewy luv

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great broom. swept up broken glass , great for dust.
customer_reviews.author: meitenezeltene

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom
customer_reviews.text: light weight, works great. Seems strong and sweeps well for the price can't be beat
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L Shields

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great broom that I use for indoors--works much better than the OXO broom I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Kat H.

customer_reviews.title: Good broom. The bristles are fine enough to sweep ...
customer_reviews.text: Good broom. The bristles are fine enough to sweep most dust and debris. I've had broom which had course bristles and those are useless, it does not sweep the dust, but this one does. It's quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Maruyama

customer_reviews.title: ... after reading all the comments but I am highly disappointed. It claims that it has soft bristles but ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the broom after reading all the comments but I am highly disappointed. It claims that it has soft bristles but in reality it is hard as compared to my old broom. It is difficult to sweep the floor with this broom. Will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, it grabs all the cat litter and dust/dirt cat hair in the first pass
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Broom was defective. Handle did not match the base ...
customer_reviews.text: Broom was defective. Handle did not match the base and kept falling out.
customer_reviews.author: RZRBACK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: A decent, sturdy product, O-Cedar usually is. Does the job it was designed to do, used on a commercial property.
customer_reviews.author: Shih Tzu mom

customer_reviews.title: Good Broom.
customer_reviews.text: Good construction, no complaints so far. It is a basic broom that functions as desired.
customer_reviews.author: Struggler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good broom for the house not so much the sidewalk....
customer_reviews.author: Galeann

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: Dog lovers delight! I own a large Chow dog who sheds twice a year and thinks he owns the house. The O-Cedar broom picks up everything and especially his fur which I cannot always see. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chique

customer_reviews.title: didn't received all of order
customer_reviews.text: 1 broom should be 2. product description says 2 count. sending back, won't spend 37.98 for 1 broom.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rixey

customer_reviews.title: Great broom
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic broom! Breaks down easy, and cleans very well. Also long enough for taller people to use.
customer_reviews.author: jesse parsons

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. We've had our for at least 6 months now and it's held up.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent wide-angle broom. Bristles firm enough to sweep snow off the steps this past winter (El. 4500, Oregon).
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL K

customer_reviews.title: I use this broom for my walls and Ceilings get ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this broom for my walls and Ceilings get the dust bunny's down. Works well, getting one for my floor next time.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: A Joy For Cleaning Corners
customer_reviews.text: I love this broom and most especially the end made for getting into corners. I will never go back to the regular brooms. I highly recommend this broom.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. Bristles aren't too soft or too hard. Perfect for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Corey L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and vendor
customer_reviews.text: I use this excellent broom daily very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Average Function
customer_reviews.text: Collects hair and frayed at the tips within 2 weeks. :-( It sweeps well, but I don't find this item to be exceptional. It's just a broom.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor M.

customer_reviews.title: Product is as billed
customer_reviews.text: Decent lightweight broom, used for sweeping out my truck. Removable handle and angled bristles work well in the foot wells. I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and maneuver. Just an excellent broom. Hope it is durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cornbread

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but I wonder bc it is new :)
customer_reviews.author: Gyhan Kodsy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, does just what it's meant to
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, does just what it's meant to, like the angle on the bristles helps get into corners, quite flexible not a stiff broom
customer_reviews.author: Furever A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Broom
customer_reviews.text: Nice broom-would be much better if it came with a dustpan.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard C.

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable
customer_reviews.text: The broom arrived damaged and bent, and it is unusable. Cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Lois J Ohms

customer_reviews.title: Best brooming experience I've ever had -- and as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Man o man.. Just a rock star broom that get me all jacked up every time I need to call on its services. Best brooming experience I've ever had -- and as a reference I'm a nimble little 25 year old single man that keeps his place spic-n-span and serves the Lord whole-souled.
customer_reviews.author: phil

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t ship well.
customer_reviews.text: Bristles came out of the package very mangled. We ended up having to cut off about 30 of them that were pointing outward.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Laible

product_meta.title: O-Cedar Power Corner Large Angle Broom
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackThis outdoor broom features a large angled head that reaches into corners and lets you cover more surface area. Plus, its Memory Bristles resist bending and hold their shape, so you can clean heavy debris easily.
feature_bullets: Features Double Bristle Technology: firm black bristles thoroughly pull dirt from corners while semi-soft grey bristles capture and move dirt effectively, so you don’t have to double sweep.
Cleanly sweeps up messes on everything from hardwood floors to garage floors. Flare-Tip Technology captures fine dust and hair.
Memory Bristles resist bending and hold their shape.14" sweeping width.
Bristles made from 80% recycled plastic. 55.5 inch total height

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars775 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
